functionName.description: Name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lambda Function.

provisionedConcurrentExecutions.description: Amount of capacity to allocate. Must be greater than or equal to `1`.

qualifier.description:
Lambda Function version or Lambda Alias name.

The following arguments are optional:

skipDestroy.description: Whether to retain the provisoned concurrency configuration upon destruction. Defaults to `false`. If set to `true`, the resource in simply removed from state instead.
